title: How long does it take to repair leauge client?
body:
How long does league take to repair?
I've scanned over 20,000 files and i just closed it and restarted it but now I'm back to square one......and scanning over 1000 files, tell at least long does it take to repair? AND PLZ...DUN TELL ME ITS 5 HOURS.......CUZ I AINT WAITING THE WHOLE DAY ON IT.....(if it is then ill wait)

replies.body:
When you first installed League of Legends, how long did it take to download the patch? That, plus one hour, is roughly how long it takes to repair.

If you can't be bothered waiting that long, just reinstall the game. It effectively does the same thing, but a much cleaner job.
